page.title: 05SEATON COURT
page.content: In Blackburn there are quite a few old people's homes, but we have chosen {Seaton Court}on the Roman Road estate to write about. This is a council-owned protected dwelling and the thirty-seven occupants are between the ages of 65-90 years old. Every morning the warden goes around to see if the old people are well. Any ill people are sent to a nursing home where they will be looked after. Shopping and looking after their rooms are just some ways the people occupy themselves. Concerts are held and there are outings anywhere in Britain. The warden and the cleaner organize these entertainments. Because of the helpful staff, the old people are kept very happy and comfortable and it is the sort of place that we would like to live in when we are old.
